page.title: 06TOURIST ACCOMMODATION
page.content: Eden D.C and Kirkby Stephen local council are trying to attract more {tourists}in to the area. It is a very good walking centre for the energetic or long walkers.The{Eden is well known for its trout in the area. There are five{inns and hotels}with meals and accommodation in the area and a good number of{private homes doing{bed and breakfast.}Prices range from Â£14 single B&B in a hotel to Â£7.50 in a private house.There are also a few{holiday flats}available to let. The{Youth Hostel}moved in 1981 from where it used to be above the Friends Meeting House to the former Methodist Chapel on Fletcher Hill.It is one of the longest established hostels in Northern England. A caravan site would be worth having.
